entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind north 40 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
